web_snippets: Mike Berners-Lee is an English researcher and writer on carbon footprinting. He is a Professor in Practice at Lancaster University
Mike Berners-Lee is the founder and Director of Small World Consulting, which has been working on climate change since 2005.
Mike Berners-Lee is a leading keynote speaker on sustainability, climate change and on how we can each address this urgent and overarching 21st century ...
